beforeQuote(address).details: This hook function can be used to change state right before the price is read. For example it can be used      for curve read only reentrancy protection. In majority of implementations this will be an empty function.      WARNING: reverts are propagated to Silo so if `beforeQuote` reverts, Silo reverts as well.

returns._0: address of token in which quote (price) is denominated

beforeQuote(address).notice: Hook function to call before `quote` function reads price
